description: Level cinematic video generation manifest - Stellar Descent

assets.prompt: Cinematic sci-fi space station interior scene. Camera slowly moves through a cryo-bay with multiple hibernation pods glowing with soft blue light. Warning alarms flash red in the background. One pod begins to open with steam and hydraulic sounds. Dark metallic corridors with holographic displays. Dramatic lighting with lens flares. Ambient humming of machinery. Subtle warning klaxons. High-end CGI quality, Alien movie aesthetic, atmospheric tension. Style is grounded military science fiction with realistic materials and physically plausible lighting.
assets.negativePrompt: neon colors, cyberpunk lighting, purple color grading, blue color grading, glowing armor, holograms, HUD overlays, anime style, cartoon style, painterly style, illustrated style, fantasy elements, magic effects, medieval designs, low quality, blurry

assets.prompt: Cinematic military dropship descent through alien planet atmosphere. POV from inside looking out window at orange-red sky with swirling dust clouds. Turbulence shakes the camera. Silhouettes of other drop pods falling alongside. Surface approaching rapidly with alien terrain visible - red canyons and strange rock formations. Military HUD elements flickering. Engine roar, radio chatter, atmospheric buffeting sounds. Intensity increases as ground approaches. Starship Troopers meets Halo ODST aesthetic. Style is grounded military science fiction with realistic materials and physically plausible lighting.

Engine roar, gravel spray, wind rushing. Mad Max meets Starship Troopers aesthetic. Dynamic camera work, intense action. assets.prompt: Cinematic establishing shot of abandoned military forward operating base on alien planet. Camera slowly pans across damaged structures, overturned vehicles, blast craters. Wind howls through broken buildings. Flickering emergency lights. Signs of desperate last stand - sandbag emplacements, spent shell casings. Eerie silence broken by distant alien screech. Atmospheric horror, Aliens movie aesthetic. Style is grounded military science fiction with realistic materials and physically plausible lighting.
